net.cwroethel.swt.popupcalendar
Class DateChooserPanel

java.lang.Object
  Composite
      net.cwroethel.swt.popupcalendar.DateChooserPanel
Direct Known Subclasses:
DateChooser, DaySelector, MonthSelector, TodaySelector
public abstract class DateChooserPanel
extends Composite

DateChooserPanel is an abstract class used as container for the three DateChooser component classes. If the components are used by DateChooser, they are registered with an SelectionListener and, depending on the SelectionEvent detail (event.detail), the corresponding actions are taken. 

   daySelector = new DaySelector(shell);
   daySelector.addSelectionListener(new SelectionAdapter() {
      public void widgetSelected(SelectionEvent e) {
         ... do something...
      }
    });

Version:
$Revision: 1.2 $
Author:
Will Roethel, http://www.cwroethel.net
